text: RT @drsianhenley: Anyone going to #EGU23 interested in #Antarctic marine systems or sea ice (or both!) should check out this excellent new research from @milo_bischof! ... text:
My poetry summary of GDB2 at #EGU23 #EGU_G

Great debate
‘bout climate change.
We know:
it accelerarates.

Bad news on TV
due to more extremes.
People lose their lives
as sea levels rise.

It’s an inferno.
So scientists: let’s go.
Mix disciplines, 
further the IPCCs.

Vienna has warmed by around 2°C since 1775, with most warming occurring in the last 70 years.
